TopicTitle: Where can i get some good fairings?

Articles.Content: I have a couple oddball fairings laying around and NovaPunch's pack, but I can never seem to find the right one. I need a perfect 5m-2.5m fairing for an Apollo remake ive been working on. I tried looking up some more mod packs, but nothing really turns up. I heard of fairing factor awhile back, but it seems its no longer functioning.

Procedural Fairings cover pretty much everything possible with fairings

I've removed all other fairings from my parts list!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/39512-0-21-Procedural-Fairings-2-4-1-interstage-adapter-added

I have that mod I didn't know it could do half walls. I though It just covers the whole ship lol. But..in order to make a sectioned fairings you need two of those bulkheads right? So in my case a 5m - 2.5m. That'd work, but id have to divide my payload in half.
